page.title: 13C M 's Own Magazine
page.content: The "Shammickite" is C M's own magazine,first published in 1983 and so called after an old Devonian word meaning a shanty town. This magazine, which comes out each month except August, is produced by a stalwart band of volunteers who do the typing,printing and collating. It is quite free and is supported by a small Council grant and donations. Anyone can contribute items of interest. Regular features are reports from the various clubs, associations and leisure activities in the village. There are also articles from the main village churches and a full report of the Parish Council meetings. There is usually a quiz or crossword puzzle and a list of forthcoming events.
